articles.title: Scientists discover one thing that all dead bodies have in common - indy100
articles.description:
They say no two people are the same, but scientists have discovered that all corpses have more in common than previously thought. 
As new research published in Nature Microbiology shows, dead bodies share similarities regardless of where they’re from when it …
